title: PBE Verification 2018
body: I'm trying to get my account verified for PBE but instead of saying send to SMS or Email it just directly tells me to add Third party verification, what am I supposed to do at this point? I need it because all my games are dodges and people from different countries who troll and leave lobby at 0 seconds, please HELP!

replies.body: AFAIK PBE doesn't have third party verification setup yet, is [**this the website**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe) you're using to signup?
No, I am doing it through client, and I said Third party because that is the message that was showing up when i went to the verification tab on the PBE client settings.

I must be a little confused here. You're trying to signup for PBE through the client? You'll need to signup and [**create a PBE account on this website first**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe).
